abstract: Fire at Museum of Portuguese Language in Sao Paulo, Brazil, kills one firefighter and guts museum, important landmark and cultural resource for region; cause of fire has not been determined.
lead_paragraph: The cause of the blaze at the Museum of the Portuguese Language in São Paulo — or the Museu da Língua Portuguesa — where a firefighter was killed, has not been determined.

headline.main: Brazil: Fire Destroys São Paulo Museum
headline.print_headline: The Americas; Brazil: Fire Destroys São Paulo Museum

snippet: The cause of the blaze at the Museum of the Portuguese Language in São Paulo — or the Museu da Língua Portuguesa — where a firefighter was killed, has not been determined.
